@Name: Invokable Control Element with Variadic Parameters
Description:
A named-callable or method control element has a signature that
					supports a variable (variadic) number of parameters or arguments.

xhtml:p: This issue can prevent the product from running reliably.  If the relevant code is reachable by an attacker, then this reliability problem might introduce a vulnerability.
With variadic arguments, it can be difficult or inefficient for manual analysis to be certain of which function/method is being invoked.

Submission.Submission_Comment: Entry derived from Common Quality Enumeration (CQE) Draft 0.9.
